DOC.brief_summary: This study assess long term safety performance GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis treatment patient Popliteal Artery Aneurysms .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis Treatment Popliteal Artery Aneurysm ( PAA )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion study require patient : 1 . Received GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis treat popliteal artery aneurysm 2 . Had symptomatic aneurysm asymptomatic aneurysm ( ≥ 2 cm diameter ) popliteal artery , presence mural thrombus ( < 2 cm ) popliteal artery ; 3 . Was 18 year age old time treatment ; 4 . Had elective popliteal artery aneurysm procedure ; 5 . Has provide Informed Consent , personally lawful representation determine applicable local regulation state law Prior time implant patient / : 1 . Bilateral popliteal artery aneurysms initial treatment day ; 2 . Thrombotic occlusion popliteal artery PAA ; 3 . Marfan syndrome EhlersDanlos syndrome ; 4 . Unable tolerate antiplatelet therapy ; 5 . Thrombophilia require long term anticoagulation ; 6 . Known allergy GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis component ; 7 . Enrolled another investigational drug medical device trial participation may affect outcome treatment subject popliteal artery aneurysm study GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis previous surgery popliteal artery aneurysm study limb .
